definition: see 拐彎抹角|拐弯抹角[guai3 wan1 mo4 jiao3]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
to smear/to wipe/to erase/classifier for wisps of cloud, light-beams etc
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: She always angles for a free ticket.
sentences.chinese: 她轉彎抹角地想要一張免費票。

sentences.english: Shiqu tortuous, from west to east, drainage density Shop at the end of black gravel.
sentences.chinese: 石渠轉彎抹角，由西向東，渠底密鋪黑色卵石。

sentences.english: Tell me the point, and don't beat around the bush.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我重點，不要轉彎抹角地說。

sentences.english: His beating around the bush manners of speaking has made it difficult for us to fathom his true intention.
sentences.chinese: 他講得很轉彎抹角，我們難以摸透他的真正用意。

sentences.english: Abrupt and often disconcertingly frank in speech.
sentences.chinese: 說話率直的，不轉彎抹角的。

sentences.english: But the negotiations proved long and tortuous .
sentences.chinese: 但談判還是轉彎抹角地拖了很久。

sentences.english: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.chinese: 我想他肯定是警察，他不斷地轉彎抹角地打聽消息。

sentences.english: I wish you'd stop beating about the bush and tell me that you really want.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要轉彎抹角，快告訴我你到底想要什麼。

sentences.english: One day something happened which in a roundabout way was enlightening.
sentences.chinese: 有一天發生了一件事，很有一點轉彎抹角的啓發性。

sentences.english: He speaks in a roundabout way and no one knows what he is drive at.
sentences.chinese: 他講得很轉彎抹角，我們難以摸透他的真正用意。
